Details.Name: Petrol
Details.Feature: Up to 16.6% savings on S$500 ANZ StarCash prepaid card for refuel at Caltex

Up to 20.4% savings on petrol at Caltex ($3 off every $50 gross petrol (Valid till 30 Sep 2016) + 5% site discount + Caltex Thanks! points + ANZ Bonus Rewards Programme with min. $500 retail spend in same month (Vaild till 30 Sep 2016))

Details.Name: Grocery
Details.Feature: 6X Rewards Points for spend on selected grocery, transport and entertainment spend

Details.Name: Rewards
Details.Feature: 6X Rewards Points for spend on selected grocery, transport and entertainment spend
2X Rewards Points for online and overseas spend
20X Rewards Points at participating merchants such as Caltex, G2000, Courts, Dorothy Perkins and more, with minimum spend of $500 in the same calendar month (Valid till 30 Sep 2016)
